title: PP-22   Test to verify the login functionality after trying to change the password
author: Bianca
actual result: This error ,,error\_backend\_authentificationFailed\`\` appeares for a few seconds and the account is not logging in.

title: PP-24 BUG.  Test for checking the functionality of changing a password using invalid data
author: Bianca
actual result: After inserting the invalid password and the new one, the window closes. I don't know if something happened because after i try to login again i get another back-end authentification error. The connection is still possible with Facebook.

title: PP-17 BUG.   Test to verify the functionality of inviting friends in the application / ``share and win''
author: Bianca
actual result:
After the contact created the account, he only got 10 RON discount for 1 order, but it should have been for 3 orders. 
The first user received nothing, but it should have received 30 RON for 3 orders. Also, after the contact made his first order, the first user should have received 20 RON, but received nothing. 
The discount is not available, not in the summary of the order and also not in the promotional codes.

title: PP-18 BUG.  Test to verify the functionality of entering a valid discount code
author: Bianca
actual result: After inserting the valid code, a message says that the code is not valid because it was already used.

title: PP-15 BUG. Test to verify the accuracy / grammar of the text
author: Bianca
actual result: Go in the sellers pages. The infromations about the products are written without diacritics and so is the name of the restaurants that should contain those. Also, some restaurants/locals have missing information about the products, such as the weight of the food. - See Tinecz, Berărescu, Pizzeria Nuova Mamma Mia, Pizza Napoleon, Pizzeria Celentano, Seneville, Meat Busters, Pizza Land, Pizzeria Casa del Sole, Pizza la Buona, Pizza No 1, Minna Baclava & Patiserie, Pizza Fresca, L'Amorosa, Pizza Bună Bună,

title: PP-8 BUG.  Test to verify the ,,Explore`` tool without creating an account or being logged in
author: Bianca
actual result: When using the explore tool, after the homepage opens, an error appeares with the message ,,An error occurred with this request. Try again\`\` After clicking on it, nothing happens.
